DOC.brief_summary: Proprioceptive training has been shown to be effective in increasing the efficiency of motor-sensory tissues that stabilize the trunk. The investigators hypothesis is that proprioceptive support do influence in the activation of the transversus abdominis muscle (TrA) during segmental stabilization training.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Thoracolumbar Proprioceptive Support in the Segmental Stabilization Training
DOC.criteria: healthy subjects subjects with any kind of disease
